languages.text: The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.
languages.original_text: Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цель получает <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера + 30% текущего {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} цели)</u> психического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. В случае успеха цель получает <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The target must pass a Willpower resistance test. If the test fails, the target suffers <u>(Psyker's staff power level)+(Psyker's psy rating)+(30% of the target's current wounds)</u> mental damage. If the test succeeds, the target instead suffers <u>(Psyker's stave power level)</u> mental damage.

The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If the test succeeds, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If the test succeeds, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If the test succeeds, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

languages.text: Цель выполняет {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цель получает <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g} псайкера + 30% текущего {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} цели)</u> психического урона. Часть урона, составляющая 30% от текущего здоровья цели, не может превышать 300. В случае успеха цель получает <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психического урона{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} fails, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. If the test succeeds, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цель выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цель получает <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + пси-рейтинг псайкера + 30% текущего здоровья цели)</u> психического урона. В случае успеха цель получает <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> психического урона.

Цель выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цель получает <u>(уровень посоха псайкера + пси-рейтинг псайкера + 30% текущего здоровья цели)</u> психического урона. В случае успеха цель получает <u>уровень посоха псайкера</u> психического урона.

languages.text: 目标需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，目标会受到<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级+灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}+目标当前{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的30%）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。“当前生命值30%”部分的伤害最高不能超过300点。若检定成功，目标会受到<u>灵能者法杖力量等级</u>点精神伤害。
languages.original_text: The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

traits.locale_text: 目标需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，目标会受到<u>（灵能者法杖力量等级+灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}+目标当前{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的30%）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。“当前生命值30%”部分的伤害最高不能超过300点。若检定成功，目标会受到<u>灵能者法杖力量等级</u>点精神伤害。

languages.text: El objetivo debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad. Si la falla, el objetivo sufre <u>(nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico + 30 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} actuales del objetivo)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. La parte del daño igual al 30 % de las heridas actuales del objetivo no puede ser superior a 300. Si supera la prueba, en vez de lo anterior el objetivo sufre <u>nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico</u> de daño mental.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo debe realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad. Si la falla, el objetivo sufre <u>(nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g} del psíquico + 30 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} actuales del objetivo)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. La parte del daño igual al 30 % de las heridas actuales del objetivo no puede ser superior a 300. Si supera la prueba, en vez de lo anterior el objetivo sufre <u>nivel de poder del báculo del psíquico</u> de daño mental.

languages.text: Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Willenskraft bestehen. Wenn die Probe scheitert, erleidet das Ziel <u>(Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers + 30 % der aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Der Teil des Schadens, der 30 % der aktuellen Wunden des Ziels entspricht, darf 300 nicht übersteigen. Wenn die Probe bestanden wird, erleidet das Ziel stattdessen <u>Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers</u> Mentalschaden.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Willenskraft bestehen. Wenn die Probe scheitert, erleidet das Ziel <u>(Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers + 30 % der aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Der Teil des Schadens, der 30 % der aktuellen Wunden des Ziels entspricht, darf 300 nicht übersteigen. Wenn die Probe bestanden wird, erleidet das Ziel stattdessen <u>Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers</u> Mentalschaden.

Das Ziel muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf Willenskraft bestehen. Wenn die Probe scheitert, erleidet das Ziel <u>(Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g} des Psionikers + 30 % der aktuellen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Ziels)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Der Teil des Schadens, der 30 % der aktuellen Wunden des Ziels entspricht, darf 300 nicht übersteigen. Wenn die Probe bestanden wird, erleidet das Ziel stattdessen <u>Stab-Energiestufe des Psionikers</u> Mentalschaden.

languages.text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Volonté. En cas d'échec, elle subit <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Indice psy{/g} du psyker + 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} actuelles de la cible)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. La part de dégâts égale à 30 % des blessures de la cible ne peut dépasser 300. En cas de réussite, la cible subit seulement <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> points de dégâts mentaux.
languages.original_text: The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

traits.locale_text: La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Volonté. En cas d'échec, elle subit <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Indice psy{/g} du psyker + 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} actuelles de la cible)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. La part de dégâts égale à 30 % des blessures de la cible ne peut dépasser 300. En cas de réussite, la cible subit seulement <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> points de dégâts mentaux.

La cible doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Volonté. En cas d'échec, elle subit <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Indice psy{/g} du psyker + 30 % des {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} actuelles de la cible)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. La part de dégâts égale à 30 % des blessures de la cible ne peut dépasser 300. En cas de réussite, la cible subit seulement <u>(niveau de puissance du bâton du psyker)</u> points de dégâts mentaux.

languages.text: ターゲットは意志力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、ターゲットは<u>(異能者の杖のパワーレベル + 異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g} + ターゲットの現在{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の30%)</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。ターゲットの現在の体力の30%に相当する一部ダメージは、300を超えることはない。判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは代わりに<u>異能者の杖のパワーレベル</u>分の精神ダメージを受ける。
languages.original_text: The target must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. If failed, the target suffers <u>(psyker's staff power level + psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} + 30% of the target's current {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. The part of the damage equal to 30% of the target's current wounds cannot exceed 300. If passed, the target instead suffers <u>psyker's staff power level</u> mental damage.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットは意志力{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。判定に失敗した場合、ターゲットは<u>(異能者の杖のパワーレベル + 異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g} + ターゲットの現在{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}の30%)</u>分の{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神ダメージ{/g}を受ける。ターゲットの現在の体力の30%に相当する一部ダメージは、300を超えることはない。判定に成功した場合、ターゲットは代わりに<u>異能者の杖のパワーレベル</u>分の精神ダメージを受ける。
